mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTI(NOTI_ETPR_CODE, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, NOTI_DATE, NOTI_CTGRY_ICON_FILE_STRE_NM, COMMON_CODE_NOTI_KIND) VALUES ('NOTI-' || NOTI_SEQ.nextval || '-' || TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd'), #{notiTitle}, #{notiContent}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd'), #{notiCtgryIconFileStreNm}, 'NOTI020')
